## Enumerations

### enum  {#a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::offloading::OffloadEntryKindFlag : uint32&#95;t</>}>
Offloading entry flags for CUDA / HIP.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57a923b860456c7e27007bf11d0069cfdb2" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalEntry">
Mark the entry as a global entry (= 0x0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57aa0793e58f3eff2e957cb0f21c576bfa8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalManagedEntry">
Mark the entry as a managed global variable (= 0x1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57a19c883805ad6071c9922c23720d90676" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalSurfaceEntry">
Mark the entry as a surface variable (= 0x2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57a381cb6a73ee086038196fda5c4d0879a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalTextureEntry">
Mark the entry as a texture variable (= 0x3)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57ac859aa67b07ccd5fba9df78343e14fed" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalExtern">
Mark the entry as being extern (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; 3)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57af71523a48c2d983a6408fbe16cecab94" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalConstant">
Mark the entry as being constant (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; 4)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a7419ce8b8f6793fdec6d80b80d731b57a8db334373b12649f212522b471a4efcc" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OffloadGlobalNormalized">
Mark the entry as being a normalized surface (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; 5)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

The first three bits indicate the type of entry while the others are a bit field for additional information.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/offloading/utility-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/offloading/utility-h">Utility.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### emitOffloadingEntry() {#a4b79b6c874e2b55eb4dda2ae96867f84}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::offloading::emitOffloadingEntry (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/object/#a92b4561998310fbcfbeaeb7c449bad6a">object::OffloadKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, uint64&#95;t Size, uint32&#95;t Flags, uint64&#95;t Data, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SectionName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; AuxAddr=nullptr)</>}>
Create an offloading section struct used to register this global at runtime.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="M">The module to be used</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Addr">The pointer to the global being registered.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Kind">The offloading language expected to consume this.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Name">The symbol name associated with the global.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The size in bytes of the global (0 for functions).</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Flags">Flags associated with the entry.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Data">Extra data storage associated with the entry.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname&quot;>SectionName</a>">The section this entry will be placed at.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="AuxAddr">An extra pointer if needed.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/offloading/utility-h/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/offloading/utility-h">Utility.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/frontend/lib/frontend/offloading/utility-cpp/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/frontend/lib/frontend/offloading/utility-cpp">Utility.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

the constant struct and the global variable holding the symbol name.

### wrapCudaBinary() {#ae8476f6b1335517f24e2a9236806f425}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::offloading::wrapCudaBinary (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">llvm::Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">llvm::ArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; Images, <a href="#a8b583147c80ad356eeccb01b64688984">EntryArrayTy</a> EntryArray, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> Suffix=&quot;&quot;, bool EmitSurfacesAndTextures=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Wraps the input fatbinary image into the module <code>M</code> as global symbols and registers the images with the CUDA runtime.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="EntryArray">Optional pair pointing to the <code>&#95;&#95;start</code> and <code>&#95;&#95;stop</code> symbols holding the <code>&#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry</code> array.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Suffix">An optional suffix appended to the emitted symbols.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="EmitSurfacesAndTextures">Whether to emit surface and textures registration code. It defaults to false.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
